page.title: 05Redlynch School Today
page.content: Redlynch C.E. Aided School is a primary school with 71 pupils aged from five to eleven who mostly come from the parish of Redlynch.The school has three classes, one of which is housed in a "mobile" classroom.The school is surrounded by a large playing field which, according to the season, is football field,rounders pitch and athletics field. The curriculum includes literacy and language development, mathematics, science, religious education, topic based work, creative crafts, music, and physical education. The teaching staff include a head, deputy, one full time and one part time teacher.A welfare helper assists two children with special needs, one of whom has Down's syndrome.There are four domestic assistants and a secretary.
